title: Leg wound
text: Double damage and target's land speed is halved and can't swim for 1d4 rounds.

title: Grazing hit
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away.

title: Vulnerable spot
text: Normal damage and target takes 1d4 %ABILITY-DAMAGE=ability damage% of your choice.

title: Bleeder
text: Double damage and 1d6 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Heart shot
text: Triple damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Deep wound
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-NAUSEATED=nauseated% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).

title: Ragged wound
text: Normal damage and 1d8 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Sucking chest wound
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).

title: Lodged in the Bone
text: Double damage and 2 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. This bleed requires a DC 20 Heal check to stop.

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round.

title: Pinned arm
text: Double damage and one arm cannot move (DC 20 Str or Heal to be freed).

title: Punctured lung
text: Double damage and target begins to drown 3 round later. DC 20 Fort save each round to end effect.

title: Ventilated
text: Double damage and 2d6 %NONLETHAL-DAMAGE=nonlethal damage%.

title: Hand wound
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. -4 penalty on all rolls using that hand %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Pinhole
text: Double damage and 1 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. Target takes 1 additional bleed each round %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Perfect strike
text: Triple Damage.

title: Nerve cluster
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1d6 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort save% each round to act).

title: Penetrating wound
text: Double damage and ignore DR.

title: Kidney piercing
text: Double damage and target %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 2d4 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%).

title: Achilles' heel
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Spinal tap
text: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks and ability checks for 1d4 rounds.

title: In a row
text: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target.

title: Blown back
text: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Appendicitis
text: Double damage and target is poisoned (treat as Greenblood oil - Dungeon Master's Guide 297).

title: Javelin catcher
text: Double damage and 1d6 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed% if from ranged attack.

title: Cheek pierced
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%. Target gains 50% spell failure chance for verbal spells %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Calf hole
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Painful poke
text: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action until next round.

title: Pierced
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1 round.

title: Tenacious wound
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target does not heal this damage naturally.

title: Muscles severed
text: Normal damage and 1d6 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% and 1d6 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Infection
text: Double damage and target contracts Filth fever (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%. Dungeon Master's Guide 292).

title: Overreaction
text: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents.

title: Spun around
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-FLAT-FOOTED=flat-footed% for 1 round.

title: Eye patch for you
text: Triple damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DRAIN=drain%. -4 to Spot and ranged attacks %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Forearm piercing
text: Double damage and target has 1 item disarmed.

title: Clean through
text: Normal damage and 1d6 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed% and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DRAIN=drain%.

title: Surprise opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty.

title: Organ scramble
text: Double damage and 1d6 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Deep hurting
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-FATIGUED=fatigued%.

title: Tongue piercing
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%. Target gains 50% spell failure chance for verbal spells %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Shoulder wound
text: Double damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-STR=Str% and %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Left reeling
text: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

title: Elbow pierced
text: Double damage and target drops 1 item being held.

title: Bicep wound
text: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Nailed in place
text: Double damage and target cannot move (DC 20 Str check negates).

title: Guarded strike
text: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round.

title: Right in the ear
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-INT=Int% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and 1 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Chipped bone
text: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Stinger
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Nicked an artery
text: Normal damage and 2d6 %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.
